Business development & advisory services

We are skilled practitioners in the areas of commercial real estate and structured finance. Our principals are innovators that lead market change. We can put this culture of innovation to work for you and provide solutions to problems of valuation, risk management and investment strategy. We are also accomplished business owners that can assist you in differentiating your product and platform.

  • Structured Finance Consulting
  • Business and Asset Valuation
  • Portfolio Surveillance and Analytics
  • Business Strategy and Implementation Consulting
  • Litigation Support and Expert Testimony
